meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Pearson Maryanne Lewell Becky Giardina Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6709.

td.p: John Pearson, a 4th grade math teacher from Richardson, Texas
Maryanne Lewell, a high school history teacher from Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada
Becky Giardina, a 7th grade social studies teacher from Martinez, Georgia

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(John: [With an [*] accent] Who is [*]?)
(Alex: [With an [*] accent] Yeah, you\'re right.)
[Laughter]

Elvis

John
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 2013 the annual August tribute week to him in Memphis included a Graceland trivia tour')

tr.td: In 2013 the annual August tribute week to him in Memphis included a Graceland trivia tour

earthquake

John
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_5', 'clue_J_2_5_stuck', '[Applause for John\'s run of the category]
(Alex: Hey, well done. But you\'ve been watching far too much television over the years, John.)
(John: Guilty as charged.)
(Alex: All right, it\'s paying off, though. Keep it going.)

Blue Bloods

John
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
MaryanneWhat is the fleur de lis?
$9,400
BeckyWhat is the fleur de lis?
$8,001
JohnWhat is a Fleur de leis?
$0
the fleur-de-lis')
